problem_statement: Mental wellness challenges are widespread, yet many people lack accessible tools for daily emotional check-ins, pattern recognition, and personalized coping strategies. Traditional apps often feel impersonal and fail to adapt to users' changing mental states.
solution: SerenityAI is an AI-powered mental wellness companion that uses JacLang's byLLM agents and OSP graph architecture to provide personalized emotional support. The app tracks moods, offers AI coaching, and helps users understand their emotional patterns through intelligent analysis.
key_features: Mood Check-in: Log emotions with emoji wheel, receive AI-generated empathetic responses
Mind Coach: Productivity coaching that considers mental state (hydration, breaks, sleep reminders)
Smart Journal: Side-by-side layout with AI insights analyzing entry sentiment
Pattern Analysis: Weekly trend detection with visual charts and clickable recommendations
Breathing Exercises: Personalized stress-relief exercises based on stress level
Mood History: Clickable timeline with modal popups showing detailed past entries

architecture.approach: Hybrid Architecture combining JacLang concepts with FastAPI reliability

frontend.features: Glass-morphism UI, responsive design, real-time updates

backend.features: REST API endpoints matching JacLang walker patterns

technical_highlights: OSP Graph with 6 node types and 6 edge types
Hybrid approach ensures reliable demo while demonstrating JacLang patterns
Premium UI with glass-morphism, gradients, animations
Fully responsive design for mobile and desktop
future_roadmap: Supabase integration for persistent data storage
